description: Tikiz Shaved Ice & Ice Cream is bringin' back the ice cream truck! The Tikiz truck is a brand new $100,000+ fully custom-built Shaved Ice & Ice Cream truck that runs on battery power while onsite so there are no loud generators or pollution.  The Tikiz truck features water misters, our “Patented” self-serve "Surv-Board" on the back of the truck, a Bose speaker system that plays our steel drum tropical music and we can serve up to 400-600 people per hour.
name: Tikiz Shaved Ice & Ice Cream
